prompt: What is the capital of France?
Explain quantum computing in one sentence.
What is 2+2?
List three benefits of exercise.
What is the speed of light?
Define photosynthesis.
What year did World War II end?
Name the largest planet in our solar system.
What is the chemical formula for water?
Who wrote Romeo and Juliet?

Please analyze the following legal contract excerpt and identify all clauses related to termination, intellectual property rights, and dispute resolution. The contract is between a software development company and a client, covering a 12-month engagement for building a custom CRM system. Include references to specific sections and explain the implications of each clause in plain language.

Review this employment agreement and summarize the key terms: salary structure, benefits package, non-compete clauses, confidentiality requirements, and termination conditions. The document is 15 pages long and includes appendices covering stock options and performance bonuses.

Examine this merger and acquisition agreement between two technology companies. Identify all representations and warranties, conditions precedent to closing, indemnification provisions, and any material adverse change clauses. The document includes financial statements, asset lists, and employee transition plans.

Summarize the key findings from this 50-page research paper on climate change impacts on agricultural productivity. Focus on methodology, statistical significance of results, regional variations, and recommendations for policy makers. Include specific data points and confidence intervals.

Analyze this comprehensive market research report covering the AI software industry from 2020 to 2025. Extract trends, growth projections, competitive landscape analysis, and investment patterns. The report includes 30 charts, 15 tables, and detailed company profiles.

Provide a detailed summary of this 100-page technical specification document for a distributed database system. Cover architecture, data models, consistency guarantees, replication strategies, failure handling, and performance characteristics. Include all major design decisions and trade-offs.

Review this comprehensive product requirements document (PRD) for a new mobile application. Summarize user personas, feature specifications, technical requirements, integration points, security considerations, and launch timeline. The PRD includes wireframes, user flows, and API documentation.

Extract and organize all action items, deadlines, and responsible parties from this project status report. The report covers 12 different workstreams, includes risk assessments, budget updates, and resource allocation changes. Format the output as a structured action plan.

Compare and contrast the privacy policies of three major tech companies. Identify common patterns, differences in data collection practices, user rights, opt-out mechanisms, and compliance with GDPR and CCPA regulations. Highlight any concerning clauses or gaps.

Synthesize findings from 20 peer-reviewed articles on machine learning bias in hiring systems. Create a comprehensive analysis covering types of bias identified, measurement methodologies, mitigation strategies, and gaps in current research. Include a bibliography.

Fetch the latest stock prices for AAPL, GOOGL, MSFT, and TSLA. Calculate the 7-day moving average for each, identify which stock has the highest volatility, and create a comparison chart. Then send an email summary to the team.

Query the database for all customer orders from the last 30 days, filter for orders over $1000, calculate total revenue by product category, generate a CSV export, and upload it to the cloud storage bucket.

Check the current weather in San Francisco, New York, and London. If any location has rain forecasted, create a calendar reminder for tomorrow morning to bring an umbrella. Also check my calendar for outdoor meetings and send notifications.

Search for recent GitHub issues labeled 'bug' in our repository, filter by priority 'high', create a summary document, assign them to the appropriate team members based on their expertise, and post updates to Slack.

Pull sales data from the CRM API, calculate conversion rates by region, identify the top 10 performing sales reps, generate personalized performance reports, and schedule one-on-one meetings with each rep.
Monitor server logs for error rates, if errors exceed 5% in the last hour, scale up the infrastructure, send alerts to the on-call engineer, create an incident ticket, and update the status page.

Extract data from three different APIs (user analytics, payment processing, and customer support), merge the datasets, perform statistical analysis to find correlations, generate visualizations, and publish a dashboard.

Check inventory levels across all warehouses, identify products below reorder threshold, calculate optimal order quantities using demand forecasting, place purchase orders with suppliers, and update inventory management system.

Query the data warehouse for customer churn metrics, segment customers by behavior patterns, run predictive models to identify at-risk customers, generate personalized retention campaigns, and schedule email sends.

Scan code repository for security vulnerabilities using static analysis tools, check dependencies for known CVEs, generate a security report, create tickets for high-severity issues, and notify the security team.
Based on the attached product documentation, explain how to configure the API authentication. Include step-by-step instructions, required parameters, and example code snippets.
Using the provided user manual, answer: What are the system requirements for installation? What troubleshooting steps are recommended for common errors?
Referencing the attached technical specification, describe the data flow architecture, explain how components interact, and identify potential bottlenecks or failure points.
From the provided research papers, summarize the experimental methodology, key findings, and limitations. How do these findings relate to current industry practices?
Based on the company policy documents, explain the remote work guidelines, expense reimbursement procedures, and performance review process.
Using the attached codebase documentation, explain the main design patterns used, how to add a new feature, and what testing requirements exist.
From the provided financial reports, calculate year-over-year growth rates, identify trends in revenue and expenses, and highlight any anomalies or concerns.
Referencing the attached legal documents, explain the key terms of the agreement, obligations of each party, and potential risks or areas requiring legal review.
Based on the provided meeting notes and project documentation, create a summary of decisions made, action items assigned, and next steps with deadlines.
Using the attached customer feedback and support tickets, identify common pain points, categorize issues by severity, and suggest prioritized improvements.
Convert 100 degrees Fahrenheit to Celsius.
What is the square root of 144?
Name three programming languages.
What is the largest ocean?
Define artificial intelligence.

Analyze this 25-page service level agreement (SLA) between a cloud provider and enterprise client. Extract uptime guarantees, performance metrics, penalty clauses, escalation procedures, and renewal terms. Provide a risk assessment.

Retrieve customer satisfaction scores from the last quarter, compare them to industry benchmarks, identify areas for improvement, draft improvement recommendations, and schedule a review meeting with stakeholders.
From the attached training materials, create a study guide covering the main concepts, key definitions, practice questions, and recommended resources for exam preparation.

Review this 40-page industry analysis report on renewable energy adoption. Extract market size data, growth projections, regulatory landscape, competitive analysis, and investment opportunities. Create an executive summary.

Aggregate data from multiple sources (social media APIs, web analytics, customer database), perform sentiment analysis, identify trending topics, generate insights report, and update the marketing dashboard with new metrics.
